title: Unite against big dealers for possession delay in Noida and nearby
selftext:
https://m.timesofindia.com/city/noida/registries-pending-300-homebuyers-in-noida-hold-protest/amp_articleshow/98260272.cms

We are facing same issues with Sikka builders for many years now as is there in the article - Possession delay! Is anyone here also going through the same? If yes, let's raise our voice together through protests maybe? 

We bought a flat with Sikka and they keep revising dates for possession. It has been over 5 years. 

I am still figuring out but I need to get in touch with all people who are face the same problem in Noida and around. Or if you guys have any suggestions how to deal with this. 

I have create a group for this. Please dm or comment so that we can connect.
